game.name: Fruit Row
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Is an intelligent game in the style of "Tetris", but in modern processing, where you have to line up the same fruit in a row to get experience points
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is an intelligent game in the style of "Tetris", but in modern processing, where you have to line up the same fruit in a row to get experience points
